about_the_game:
CAR MANUFACTURE DEMO

In Car Manufacture Demo, you build your own early 20th-century automobile factory. This version of the game is limited to a tutorial, where you will produce your first car and learn the basic mechanics of production and sales. Additionally, there is one challenge mission, where you will need to use your wits to fulfill a special order for military vehicles.
With nothing but a few thousand dollars, you will have the opportunity to build and develop your own factory, designing every aspect of its operation. Start by constructing buildings and organizing the first production line. Hire employees and train them to ensure their skill levels are high. Plan the optimal production process and start making money. You will need it to develop technology and research each of the sixty car models available in the game. Carefully build your brand’s reputation and become a master of promotion and sales, where popularity plays a key role. Always stay one step ahead of the competition.

Features

  • Create a unique car factory.
  • Build and optimize assembly lines for effective production.
  • Manage and train several types of stats-driven employees.
  • Promote products and set prices strategically.
  • Improve your factory by unlocking new objects and machines.
  • Explore innovative technologies and research new car models.
  • Increase your factory’s popularity to draw more clients.
  • Take part in the challenge to test your knowledge and practical skills.




The beginning of the 20th century brought new opportunities. Demonstrate the qualities of an excellent leader as you become the head of the car factory. The future of the automotive industry is in your hands.




Discover the capabilities of the production line that revolutionized automotive history by reducing production costs and speeding up car assembly. Start with individual stations, then group them together and divide tasks accordingly. Learn how to optimize the entire process and ensure a regular supply of parts.




The Research department is essential in the factory for discovering new car projects. Discovering each new project will require increasing amounts of experience and time. Acquire new technologies to build advanced devices that support and accelerate the work of scientists.




Behind every car you create are people, with varying levels of experience. It is your responsibility to ensure the factory operates at full capacity. Manage and train your employees, assigning tasks according to their skills. Keep them satisfied and well-rested to ensure efficient work. However, remember that well-trained employees demand higher wages.




Each vehicle has its life cycle, during which popularity rises and customers are willing to spend more. Learn when to run promotions, lower the price, or discontinue the production of a particular model. Overall trends and the brand quality of the manufactured cars influence popularity. Take care of it, as it directly impacts sales and the success of the factory.




Experiment with game mechanics. Some of them require multiple attempts to work optimally. Your factory can be a highly complex system, but simply observing it can be a very relaxing experience. As you gain experience, you can take on various challenges and test your skills in short missions. Some are tricky and require creativity to earn a large number of stars.
Share your impressions on our Discord server.

name: Car Manufacture Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Car Manufacture Demo is a shortened version of a tycoon game focused on building and managing a car factory. It features a tutorial where you produce your first car and includes one challenge mission to fulfill a special order for military vehicles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
